inclusion.criterion: Normal, healthy adults aged 18 to 65 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Currently taking any prescription blood thinners or anti-coagulants, or currently
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known history of anemia, thrombocytopenia, or other blood disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is pregnant or breast-feeding, or is expecting to conceive during the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms and normal blood chemistry. He is otherwise healthy.
